channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 日产表示，将在 2027 年 3 月结束的财政年度之前推出 30 款新车型，并力争将全球销量提高 100 万辆，同时削减成本以提高盈利能力。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Nissan said it would launch 30 new models by the financial year ending in March 2027 and aim to raise its global sales by 1 million vehicles while cutting costs to improve profitability. More here: https://t.co/HLxjhPKEe4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 家装零售商翠鸟再次对利润前景发出警告
item.description:
Home improvement retailer Kingfisher warns on profit outlook again https://t.co/CMaq5tU677 pic.twitter.com/Y2mJfPr0ub

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 英国同意为促进非洲粮食安全提供 1 亿美元贸易融资
item.description:
Britain agrees $100 mln trade finance to boost Africa food security https://t.co/bZ8rDyZrFz pic.twitter.com/ZRbCJozwTp

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 中国与外国首席执行官跳起更加棘手的探戈
item.description:
Breakingviews - China and foreign CEOs dance ever trickier tango https://t.co/bEvc57Xy04 https://t.co/bEvc57Xy04

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 中国承诺对外国公司与国内公司一视同仁，以吸引更多外国投资、合作和专业技术，因为这个亚洲最大的经济体正在努力升级和加强其产业链。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
China pledged to treat foreign companies the same way as domestic peers in a bid to attract more foreign investment, cooperation and expertise, as Asia's largest economy moves to upgrade and strengthen its industrial chains. More here: https://t.co/x7ffApV0nw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在中国，一则为一家杂货店招聘 18 至 30 岁收银员的招聘广告在社交媒体上引发了关于 "中年失业 "危险性的讨论，因为各年龄段的人都在争相填补工作岗位，为疲软的经济注入活力。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
A job advertisement in China seeking cashiers aged 18 to 30 at a grocery store has ignited debate on social media about the perils of ‘middle-age unemployment,’ amid a scramble to fill jobs across age groups and energize a sluggish economy. More here: https://t.co/t63eJweBd6

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 自 2020 年底以来，BBVA 的股价上涨了三倍多，缩小了与桑坦德银行的估值差距，凸显了西班牙银行之间的命运分歧，但这种分歧可能是短暂的。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
BBVA's share price has more than trebled since late 2020, narrowing its valuation gap to Santander and highlighting a divergence in fortunes between the Spanish banks that may be short-lived. More here: https://t.co/Z21PNCxq0G

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据业内人士和投资者称，创纪录的可可价格以及受通胀和地缘政治影响的市场帮助采用系统化策略的对冲基金在第一季度跑赢了同行。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
Record cocoa prices and markets whipped around by inflation and geopolitics helped hedge funds using systematic strategies outperform their peers in the first quarter, according to industry players and investors. More here: https://t.co/cqDeLi9rMS

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 西班牙银行大战，BBVA 缩小与桑坦德银行的差距
item.description:
Spain's battle of the banks as BBVA narrows gap to Santander https://t.co/G1TPmHL8h5 pic.twitter.com/zJMA4948ES

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 数据显示，由于中国交易冷淡以及更广泛的经济和地缘政治不确定性拖累了市场情绪，亚洲私募股权支持的并购活动将迎来近十年来最差的开局。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Private equity-backed mergers and acquisitions in Asia are set for their worst start to the year in nearly a decade, as a lull in dealmaking in China and broader economic and geopolitical uncertainties dragged on sentiment, data showed. More here: https://t.co/Py1LCU3TeZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 由于高利率冲击了酒店业，导致新酒店建设放缓，独立酒店运营商和全球连锁巨头正越来越多地通过特许经营协议建立联系。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Independent hotel operators and giant global chains are increasingly linking up in franchise agreements as high-interest rates have slammed the hospitality industry, slowing down new hotel construction. More here: https://t.co/T0uJTEmnSd

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 小米公司首席执行官表示，他对公司首款电动汽车的目标是成为 "最漂亮、最易驾驶、最智能的汽车"，售价低于 50 万元人民币。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Xiaomi's CEO said his goal for the firm's first electric vehicle was that it would be the ‘best looking, easiest to drive and smartest car’ priced below 500,000 yuan, as the Chinese electronics maker gears up for orders this week. More here: https://t.co/BblSMO6zUQ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 大型连锁酒店和无品牌酒店业主发现彼此需要对方
item.description:
Big hotel chains and unbranded-hotel owners find they need each other https://t.co/imR3zfIIPM pic.twitter.com/HkVwGckT7O

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者波利坦计划对 Masimo 发起第二次代理权争夺战
item.description:
Activist investor Politan plans second proxy battle at Masimo, WSJ reports https://t.co/UXs3ptgQa9 pic.twitter.com/BOK4jh02Ok

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: Impact X 计划为第二支基金投资 1 亿英镑，并获得美国银行的支持
item.description:
Impact X eyes 100 million sterling for second fund, lands Bank of America backing https://t.co/RioouH9qcw pic.twitter.com/4ohsjURCeI

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团以 3740 万美元和解信用卡集体诉讼案
item.description:
Australia's ANZ Group to settle credit cards class action for $37.4 mln https://t.co/TcZ5i4a9Iz pic.twitter.com/Bf57Uqamyl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在韩国寻求提升其金融市场全球形象的同时，这个出口大国正在努力放松严格的货币限制，多年来，这一直是该国投资者和交易商的一大痛点。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
As South Korea seeks to boost the global profile of its financial markets, the export powerhouse is struggling to loosen the tight currency restrictions that have for years been a major pain point for investors and traders in the country. More here: https://t.co/wDTjwk6Kmp

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚政府将支持今年根据通货膨胀率上调最低工资，因为低收入家庭仍在努力解决生活成本问题，尽管随着通货膨胀率的放缓，最低工资的涨幅将有所缩小。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Australia's government will support a minimum wage increase in line with inflation this year as low-income families continue to grapple with costs of living, although the rise would be smaller as inflation eased. More here: https://t.co/9UDxXP6ygE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者波利坦计划对 Masimo 发起第二次代理权争夺战

Evergrande's liquidators say company, SJ and Tianji withdraw Chapter 15 applications in US https://t.co/ez5uMigKkD pic.twitter.com/C0eWJBpESo

item.title: 秘鲁将 "纠正错误"，中远集团在特大港口拥有独家经营权
item.description:
Peru to 'correct error' that gave Cosco exclusivity in megaport https://t.co/Ecli4MukAm pic.twitter.com/5iDgp3kdq1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 23, 2024

item.title: 本周，日本央行 17 年来首次提高利率。这是一个明确的信号，表明日本已经迎来了几十年不遇的机遇：一个借钱成本更高的世界。
item.description:
Japan’s central bank raised interest rates this week for the first time in 17 years. It's a clear signal that something has arrived that Japan hasn't seen in decades: a world where it will cost more to borrow money https://t.co/ploIk4RKmB pic.twitter.com/BqzvcashZ0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 23, 2024

item.title: 秘鲁将 "纠正错误"，中远集团在特大港口拥有独家经营权
item.description:
Peru to 'correct error' that gave Cosco exclusivity in megaport https://t.co/jBxXc3e73h pic.twitter.com/tKvc3PfmvM

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 23, 2024

item.title: 就在澳大利亚储备银行认为通胀终于有所好转时，井喷式的就业数据带来了令人震惊的打击。本周更多商业新闻值得关注
item.description:
Just as the Reserve Bank of Australia thought inflation was finally coming to heel, blowout employment figures delivered a nasty shock. This, and more business stories to watch for over the coming week pic.twitter.com/hUNK6Z96R3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 23, 2024

item.title: 看：周五，纳斯达克指数小幅收高，半导体指数也在本周大幅上涨，原因是市场对人工智能的乐观情绪持续升温。道指当天收盘下跌，标普 500 指数接近持平。
item.description:
WATCH: The Nasdaq ended slightly higher on Friday, along with an index of semiconductors which was also up sharply for the week amid continued optimism over artificial intelligence. The Dow ended lower on the day and the S&P 500 was near flat https://t.co/y0Kf7GovCO pic.twitter.com/fQEq30rH3N

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 23, 2024

item.title: B.年度报告延迟后，B. Riley 遭纳斯达克警告
item.description:
B. Riley gets Nasdaq warning after annual report delay https://t.co/CNnyeaX1WL pic.twitter.com/x0Ud6n2ykx

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 23, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国 500 指数周五收盘接近持平，但在美联储本周坚持年底前三次降息的预测后，该指数创下了 2024 年以来的最大单周百分比涨幅。
item.description:
WATCH: The S&P 500 ended near flat on Friday, but the index registered its biggest weekly percentage gain of 2024 after the Federal Reserve this week stuck with projections for three interest rate cuts by year's end https://t.co/y0Kf7GnXNg pic.twitter.com/wtRRALy5YU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 23, 2024
